content.newsInsight: Israel just destroyed 1,500 buildings in Gaza since the ceasefire. Everyone's debating peace violations. We're watching concrete prices. When reconstruction contracts worth billions get signed before the rubble clears, someone mapped this playbook years ago.
content.patternInsight: You're still reading. That already puts you ahead.
content.intelligenceExample: The Gaza buildings story, for example. We read that and our mind goes to: which construction firms started hiring Arabic translators six months ago, and what does their stock movement tell us about the real timeline here?
